channel.title: Npc handdeler error 317 server
channel.description:
Voule Auto restart Could not find process: java Restarting server Online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2055) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:552) at server.main(server.java:112)
is what i get when i run my server, hwo do i fix the expection thread?
Thanks for taking your time to read this! =]

item.title: Npc handdeler error 317 server
item.dc:creator: @dream21 dream21
item.description:
@dream21 wrote:

Voule Auto restart
Could not find process: java
Restarting server
Online.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45
at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2055)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:552)
at server.main(server.java:112)

is what i get when i run my server, hwo do i fix the expection thread?

Thanks for taking your time to read this! =]
